msg: Fixing patches to catch Java exceptions for updated API.

msg: Added support for launching multiple masters in deploy scripts.

author: benh
msg: Changed the way classes are loaded in our Java collection JNI code
so that we can locate mesos.jar classes better from environments
where these aren't on the system ClassLoader. This allows Spark to
work with the new Mesos JNI changes.

msg: Trying to get the gtest directory cleaned up so that a fresh download doesn't cause the libtool error.

msg: Fixed Python test framework to work with new directory structure
